title: A suicide crisis among veterinarians
dot:
digraph Veterinary_Mental_Health{rankdir=LR;node[shape=box, style="rounded, filled", fontname="Helvetica", fontsize=12, width=2, height=0.6, fixedsize=true, fillcolor=lightblue];VetCrisis[label="Veterinary Suicide Crisis
High rates of suicide among vets
Alarming statistics (e.g., 400 deaths 1979-2015)", shape=ellipse, fillcolor=lightyellow];Factors[label="Contributing Factors", shape=ellipse, fillcolor=lightyellow];FinancialStress[label="Financial Stress", fillcolor=lightgreen];WorkloadPressure[label="Workload Pressure
Long hours, understaffed clinics", fillcolor=lightgreen];EmotionalTrauma[label="Emotional Trauma
Exposure to euthanasia, pet owner pressure", fillcolor=lightgreen];MoralDistress[label="Moral Distress
Unable to provide care due to financial barriers", fillcolor=lightgreen];MentalHealth[label="Mental Health Issues
Depression, anxiety, lack of support", fillcolor=lightgreen]; Resources[label="Emerging Resources", shape=ellipse, fillcolor=lightyellow];TrainingPrograms[label="Training Programs
Gatekeeper, suicide prevention", fillcolor=lightpink];PeerSupport[label="Peer Support
Online forums like NOMV's Lifeboat", fillcolor=lightpink];Mentorship[label="Mentorship Programs
Promoting self-care for new vets", fillcolor=lightpink];ClinicSupport[label="Clinic Support
Increasing visibility of mental health", fillcolor=lightpink]; VetCrisis->Factors[label="Causes"];Factors->FinancialStress;Factors->WorkloadPressure;Factors->EmotionalTrauma;Factors->MoralDistress;Factors->MentalHealth;VetCrisis->Resources[label="Solutions"];Resources->TrainingPrograms;Resources->PeerSupport;Resources->Mentorship;Resources->ClinicSupport;SuicideData[label="Suicide Data
Vets at higher risk: males 2x, females 4x more likely", shape=box, style=dashed, fillcolor=lightgray];NotOneMoreVet[label="Not One More Vet (NOMV)
Advocacy for mental health awareness", shape=box, style=dotted, fillcolor=lightgray];Resources->NotOneMoreVet;SuicideData->VetCrisis;}
